data.title: Iftar Meal
data.summary: It’s more than just a meal, Having the Iftar meal together fosters unity and kindness, creating bonds that transcend hunger.

featuredImage.alt: A community gathering for a Ramadan Iftar, where donated meals are shared among attendees

content.heading: Your support during Iftar extends beyond a meal; it feeds hope and strengthens communities.
content.description: In the moments of having Iftar, we find unity and compassion. Join us in providing nourishment to those fasting, sowing seeds of solidarity and care.

content.heading: How is ARCD's Relief responding?
content.description: ARCD’s Relief ensures that no one breaks their fast alone. Through our Iftar Meal project, we’re distributing nutritious meals to families, fostering a sense of togetherness during this sacred time.

content.heading: Sharing an Iftar Meal, Enhancing Unity.
content.description: Your donation directly supports families in need, ensuring they have access to wholesome meals during Ramadan. Your generosity fosters a sense of community and provides nourishment when it’s needed most.

featuredImage.alt: Completed school building in an African village, a result of Africa Relief's school-building initiative
Ruins of buildings in Morocco following a devastating earthquake, with rescue workers in action.

latestUpdates.title: Mariame Diawara and Fatoumata Tiemoko Well

featuredImage.alt: Mariame Diawara and Fatoumata Tiemoko on the well built by Africa Relief
